# TabViewCustomization.TabCustomization

**Structure**

The customizations a user has made to a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Tab].

## Declaration

```swift
struct TabCustomization
```

## Instance Properties

- **sidebarVisibility**: The visibility of the tab in the sidebar.
- **tabBarVisibility**: The visibility of the tab in the tab bar.

items.description: The visibility of the tab in the sidebar.
